VX 820 - Verifone Merchant Services Florida

EASY AND SECURE PIN ENTRY FOR CONSUMER TRANSACTIONS

COLOR DISPLAY
POWERFUL PROCESSOR
AMPLE MEMORY
EMV ENABLED
NFC/CTLS ENABLED
MSR ENABLED
GET A QUOTE

CUSTOMIZABLE

The VX 820 can also be used as part of the VX 820 duet for a complete solution, including a feature-rich, all-in-one base unit.

PURPOSEFUL DESIGN

A blazing fast processor and 160MB of memory enables merchants to simultaneously run apps and accept a variety of payment types.

MAXIMUM SECURITY

Uncompromising security features, including PCI PTS 3.0, to protect customer data and reduce merchant risk.

HIGH-PERFORMANCE, TOUCHSCREEN PIN PAD WITH STYLE

The VX 820 INTEGRATED PIN pad has a high resolution 3.5” color touchscreen and backlit keys to ensure readability in any environment. It enables on-screen branding and provides an enjoyable customer experience.

The VX 820 supports MSR, EMV, and NFC/CTLS payments, giving customers more choice and convenience when they pay.

This incredibly advanced and intuitive device is tailored to retail environments for easy consumer use. The bold, ergonomic design provides a robust feel—as a handheld PIN pad or in a mounted position. We will take care of your business with our Verifone Merchant Services in Florida.

YES I WANT THIS
Watch Video
